targets.targetFull: alias(sumSeries(alias(sumSeries($s3_server.counters.delete_object_request_count.rate, $s3_server.counters.delete_multiobject_request_count.rate), 'Delete'), alias($s3_server.counters.get_object_acl_request_count.rate, 'Acl Get'), alias($s3_server.counters.put_object_acl_request_count.rate, 'Acl Put'), alias($s3_server.counters.post_multipart_complete_request_count.rate, 'Multipart Complete'), alias($s3_server.counters.post_multipart_initiate_request_count.rate, 'Multipart Initiate'), alias($s3_server.counters.abort_multipart_request_count.rate, 'Multipart Abort'), alias($s3_server.counters.head_object_request_count.rate, 'Head'), alias($s3_server.counters.put_object_chunkupload_request_count.rate, 'Chunkupload Put'), alias($s3_server.counters.unsupported_api_count.rate, 'Unsupprted API'), alias($s3_server.counters.get_service_request_count.rate, 'Get Service')), 'Total')

alias(sumSeries(alias(sumSeries(cluster.counters.delete_object_request_count.rate, cluster.counters.delete_multiobject_request_count.rate), 'Delete'), alias(cluster.counters.get_object_acl_request_count.rate, 'ACL Get'), alias(cluster.counters.put_object_acl_request_count.rate, 'ACL Put'), alias(cluster.counters.post_multipart_complete_request_count.rate, 'Multipart Complete'), alias(cluster.counters.post_multipart_initiate_request_count.rate, 'Multipart Initiate'), alias(cluster.counters.abort_multipart_request_count.rate, 'Multipart Abort'), alias(cluster.counters.head_object_request_count.rate, 'Head'), alias(cluster.counters.put_object_chunkupload_request_count.rate, 'Chunkupload Put'), alias(cluster.counters.unsupported_api_count.rate, 'Unsupprted API'), alias(cluster.counters.get_service_request_count.rate, 'Get Service')), 'Total')
